title: The Sims 4 - TS4 Temporary Ultimate Fix update G4TW
description:
This temporary fix is the same as on Games4theworld forum. A lot of people were having issues getting from the Mirror site as was I but I got easily with a download manager. 

This is for those that were requesting a torrent. Please follow the Installation Guide exactly. If you have updated with the fix before, you can skip step 1. If you are just now moving The Sims 4 folder to a new location, remember to also exclude that location from your Anti-virus before trying to play. If you are having problems, refer back to the G4TW forum, I will not be able to help you. All the help and support you need is back on the forum.

This fix is to update The Sims 4 to 1.10.57.1020.

It includes: 

- Installation Guide 
- Latest game update
- The latest crack
- Outdoor Retreat DLC (Game Pack)
- Holiday Celebration Pack
- Pools, Ghosts, etc...
- Luxury Party Stuff Pack
- Get to Work
- Luxury Pack
- Perfect Patio Stuff
- Spa Day Pack
- Cool Kitchen Stuff



THIS IS NOT THE GAME BASE! This is only the fix with the latest expansions. Again refer back to the Games4theworld forum for any help if you have any issues. Thank you and remember to seed so that everyone else can enjoy!
